original_title: Mysteries and Myths of the Twentieth Century
overview: For everyone who believes that fact is stranger than fiction there can be nothing in the world more fascinating than the search for the truth behind the most extraordinary Mysteries and Myths of the Twentieth Century.
tagline: Now for the first time, it is possible to tell the stories of some of the most amazing mysteries and myths of this century.
title: Mysteries and Myths of the Twentieth Century
